meanings.definition: A person who uses a pencil to draw or sketch.
meanings.sent1: The young artist was known as one of the best pencillers in the class.
meanings.sent2: The pencillers at the art studio were busy working on their latest projects.
meanings.sent3: The pencillers in the art club had a 'draw-off' competition to see who could sketch the funniest animal.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the paper like skilled pencillers, bringing the characters to life.
meanings.sent5: The pencillers' hands moved swiftly, creating intricate patterns on the canvas.

meanings.definition: The group of artists responsible for creating the initial artwork in a comic book or graphic novel.
meanings.sent1: The pencillers collaborated closely with the writers to bring the story to life visually.
meanings.sent2: In the comic industry, pencillers play a crucial role in setting the tone for the entire book.
meanings.sent3: The pencillers jokingly referred to themselves as the 'art squad' within the studio.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was so seamless that the pencillers' creations seemed to leap off the page.
meanings.sent5: The pencillers' dedication to their craft was evident in every stroke of the pencil.
